product_name: Garmin vivofit Wireless Activity Tracker & Heart Rate Monitor Bundle
long_description: Garmin vivofit Wireless Activity Tracker & Heart Rate Monitor Bundle learns your current activity level, creates a personalized daily goal, tracks progress, tracks heart rate and reminds you to move. Included heart rate monitor chest strap and sensor track your heart rate data whenever you wear it; soft and breathable fabric chest strap helps ensure chafe-free comfort. vivofit monitors your sleep as well as shows your steps, goal countdown, calories, distance and time of day on its easy-to-read display. Stay motivated to be active with a red Move bar that displays after 1 hour of inactivity; additional segments light up for every 15 minutes of inactivity. Sleep mode monitors your sleep patterns while sleeping to track the quality of your rest. Wirelessly sync to the free Garmin Connect online fitness community, where you can join fitness challenges and save, plan and share your progress. vivofit records calories burned throughout the day. Garmin vivofit Wireless Activity Tracker & Heart Rate Monitor Bundle features 2 (small and large) stylish, comfortable and water-resistant wristbands, perfect for 24/7 wear.
